creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: cap with curved leather points at top that are black with gold pigments; various layers of fabric in silk and felt cascade down from top; front silk flaps depict embroidered cherry blossom trees; red felt banding across forehead area; red felt flaps of fabric on back PL and PR
markings: front PR, interior: Murray Collection label: JAP 6203
title: Woman’s fire hood (kaji-zukin)
